title: Magic Missile
content:
Magic Missile Level 1 Evocation Spell 6~15 Damage 3d4+3Force Shoot 3 magical darts, each dealing 2∼5 Force damage. They always hit their target. 18m Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Evocation Spell

Shoot 3 magical darts, each dealing 2∼5 Force damage. They always hit their target.

Magic Missile is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Magic Missile is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the
